ASBA Thrive Conference 10/ 12 Phx AZ at Events at Jackson

Spent some time with fellow entrepreneur Jay Feitlinger learning how he is doubling down on Business2.0 and Family2.0. Jay just became an author of the book Family2.0 that every entrepreneur should be reading if you want to learn how to have a happy biz and happy family life. He is also building out his Business2.0 family friendly office near the Scottsdale Civic Center. We had a great time sipping some tea and chatting about his focus on multi-location business owners need for inbound digital marketing at a budget that fits each location and gets your business growing.

Jump over to his personal website to learn more about him and link to purchase his new book. This guy is unstoppable and if you want to grow your business you need Jay and his team StringCan Interactive
Here is an easy link to get up close and personal with Jay Feitlinger

Robin Bramman is the Startup Brand Mixologist working to bring brand resources to the global marketplace and build a place for other mixology partners to showcase their digital resources.Brandtini is the Digital Brand Essentials Marketplace for startup founders, online business owners, and techpreneurs.Brandtini will unlock brand resources for:- individuals building an online presence for career advancement.- small business owners working on rebranding online sites and services- startup founders needing to build a personal digital founder portfolio and an MVP simultaneously.Over the past seven years, Robin heard many times that people could not afford to pay the big ticket agency fees for brand consulting nor did they have the time required to complete a brand audit and strategy. At the same time, Robin heard many of her brand strategy colleagues asking her to help them refresh their online websites and get their products and services digitally ready to deliver online to a larger audience. Peaked your interest? Go to Brandtini.com to add your name to our top shelf email list to get updates on new brand tools to market or become a mixologist and add your expertise to our resources.

Proud to support CO+HOOTS Foundation by joining their 2017 Board. The CO+HOOTS Foundation was founded in 2014 as the nonprofit catalyst to CO+WORK, CO+BUILD and CO+CHANGE the world through provided education, mentorship, intentional connections and leadership. Learn more at https://cohoots.com/foundation/I am working to support the CO+HOOTS Foundation and as a Board member one of my priorities is to find a sponsor in support of providing more educational events. I am seeking a $1,000 sponsor for 2017, if you are interested please contact me directly at Robin@RobinBramman.com. Depending on how you will make the donation it might qualify for tax deduction under the non-profit 501c3. Contact me and we will find out :)
Motivational Speaker & City Leader of Women Who Startup Basecamp Phoenix Monthy Events at Galvanize

In April Robin Bramman became the first City Leader for Women Who Startup Basecamp Events outside of Colorado. Robin hosts monthly Women Who Startup Basecamp events on the 4th Tuesday of every month and they are free to the public. We shine a spotlight on a female innovator/entrepreneur to help others accelerate the startup/founder learning.Looking for a speaker on the subject of branding, startups, emerging women entrepreneurship? reach out to me at robin@robinbramman.com.

Gain Clarity. Be Consistent. Start Connecting.Branding, rebranding and marketing planning for well funded start-ups, mid-large global corporations and executive branding for modern leaders and seasoned entrepreneurs.Robin Bramman specializes in developing chic integrated branding and digital marketing solutions for Executives, Entrepreneurs and Enterprises. Robin's combined industry experience, affiliate partnerships, skilled training in project management, branding and online identity, and her social media knowledge are why Robin's clients choose to work with her. Robin works with innovative clients in defining their brand and interactive strategies to LAUNCH their dreams, CONNECT with their peers and POSITION their unique brand and services online. Work with Robin and you will learn as you go, ultimately she wants you to be empowered with Clarity and Confidence to Rule Your Brand!Robin is an Agency Operations Branding Partner, contact Robin to learn more about her Brand program to get your staff certified to work with her process and toolsets or bring her in as CXO or CMO for hire and let her lead your team through brand, communications and marketing strategy to implementation and take your brand to market with global reach and expertise.

Robin Bramman partners with creative design and digital marketing teams to develop a brand strategy alongside their digital solutions. In the past year, Robin founded Brandtini™ the Brand Essentials and Product Launch Marketplace for thirsty entrepreneurs launching Spring 2017. Through Robin's agency clients, keynotes and workshops on the subject of branding, she recognized a need for startup Entrepreneurs to build a MVP-B minimum viable personal brand while building the brand of their product, service or business. Most entrepreneurs are in a race to get a logo, website and product out to market and either don't understand what branding is or can't find easy to understand and implement personal branding tools on the market. Robin is answering this problem by curating a strategic mix of brand essential ecourses, tools, and workshops to solve this problem.

Furnishing Dignity has provided me the opportunity to help move families in shelters into their own apartment and get back on their feet. Myself and my family have build a long standing relationship with one of the families and support this family ongoing at holidays and with additional housing items as they request support. It has been wonderful to see a family go from sleeping on the floor of their apartment to a fully furnished apartment and smiling faces at the holidays. They give them hope for the future!

Kiva.org is a handup for Entrepreneurs, you can donate a small amount that grows as other Entrepreneurs add to their request of funds. In no time they are fully funded and they have time to pay back the loan in small increments, when a loan is fully repaid I can pay those funds forward to another person seeking support. I choose to fund females in third world countries that have children they are trying to support by growing their business.

June 14, 2015, Bridges was a client of Robin’s

Robin's talents are far reaching and she has helped me push my business forward almost overnight.  The re-branding that we did was amazing and she took my business from looking like a one person show to the business where I am working with my team members and partners in my business. I was in a small box of where I saw myself as a solopreneur  and she made me realize that I am making a huge difference in people's lives with multiple team members there at my side.  She also provided the emotional support to see the project all of the way through.Thank you Robin!

February 10, 2015, Gerard was a client of Robin’s

Robin is a phenomenal coach that lives and breathes branding. She took me though through a well defined and thorough approach that delivered a comprehensive package that enabled me to optimize how I position myself in the marketplace. As a Marketing executive, I have a special appreciation for branding, but Robin helped me synthesize and clearly convey my distinct attributes in a way that know I could never have accomplished on my own.  She is unique in her ability and commitment to help her clients distill a clear personal brand that embodies their unique expertise, character, and passions.

September 29, 2013, Diane was a client of Robin’s

Starting your business, growing your business, discovering what is your business ... if this is what you want, then you need Robin!.  With Robin's expertise. tools, and guidance, I discovered not only what business proposition I was offering, but what value I brought to that offering.  I have hired Robin (multiple times) to develop my Personal / Executive Brand, my Company Brand, as well as a comprehensive Program Brand.  I am online, speaking nationally, and growing my business.  My message is consistent, energetic, and targets my customers.  Robin is an absolute pleasure to work with.  She is prepared, thoughtful in her recommendations and results oriented.  Robin can take you on personal and professional journey unlike what you might have imagined.  She will empower you to create your own possibilities !

July 29, 2013, Robin was senior to Deviki but didn’t manage directly

Robin is my most cherished ' Mentor in Marketing'. As a content manager at the World Trade Centers Association (WTCA), I am currently working with Robin to bring her WTCA corporate brand strategy to life, by creating content that consistently and clearly delivers the brand experience. Through this process I have learned so much from Robin, not only in marketing but also in leadership. She has taught me the importance of telling a good story to engage your consumers and the importance of "Experiencing the brand, then branding the experience". She is a true team player and is always open to learning and sharing the latest and greatest in the field of marketing. Robin is very passionate about her work and I strongly believe she would be an asset to any team she works with.

October 3, 2017, Robin worked with Tara Alexandra but at different companies

No one realizes how much Tara did behind the scenes to make things function at Reach. I’ve known her for many years and her capabilities continue to impress me. She’s organized, quick to respond, and will make sure your needs are taken care of no matter what. If I need anything, I can depend on her to get it done. She’s gone out of her way on many occasions to help me, my business, and my clients over the years. Her outstanding customer service, attention to detail, and project management skills are impressive. Tara’s someone I definitely want on my team! Contact me if you want a reference or a kick in the butt to get on board with working with Tara. She is smart with tech, she is a kind listener and she is a coach when you need some business support!

August 23, 2017, Robin worked with Sheriden but at different companies

Sheriden is my go to graphic designer and illustrator lead at eeko studio where I partner in brand, design and web for well funded startups to large corporations. Sheriden and I had the opportunity to work on a brand, design and website project for a national home builder working to modernize the building industry. Sheriden is thoughtful in her design work, taking time to understand the brand essence before developing the identity and building creative campaigns. She is capable of independent design building and takes the time to explain her designs and how they fit with the overall brand strategy. Sheriden is skilled in Wordpress and Squarespace website development and I am fortunate to have worked with her on my robinbramman.com site. Hire her for identity needs and know that she will be efficient, thoughtful and creative in her approach.

summary: STARTUP BRAND MIXOLOGIST Robin is a Senior Brand Consultant and Chief Brand Mixologist at Brandtini, the brand essentials Marketplace and Academy, where she is working to democratize brand building and help bring products to market for founders, startups, and tech entrepreneurs. At Brandtini, Robin will partner with other skilled digital mixologists to curate brand e-courses, online tools and digital products that are fun and easy to access, implement and consume. Brandtini will unlock brand resources for:- individuals building an online presence for career advancement.- small business owners working on rebranding online sites and services- startup founders needing to build a personal digital founder portfolio and an MVP simultaneously.CMO FOR HIRE / ONLINE PRESENCE EXPERTRobin is a Senior Brand Consultant who partners with agencies, well-funded start-ups, established small business owners and mid-large companies needing a brand refresh or ready to take their brand digital. Robin becomes your strategic brand and marketing partner to develop the plan and resources to launch and succeed in the global economy. Find her at RobinBramman.com or email her at robin@robinbramman.com.CERTIFIED PERSONAL BRAND STRATEGIST & INSPIRING SPEAKERWith sophistication, spunk, and style, Robin provides unique brand knowledge and tools to individual emerging leaders and tech professionals. Robin is a certified brand strategist and an inspiring speaker and edutainer who delivers speaking engagements on the subjects of business, personal branding and marketing online.  AKA/Common misspellings: Robin Brahman, Robyn Bramman, Robyn BrannanSpecialties: Start-Up Brand Tools and Online Courses, Personal & Social Branding. Public speaking & Brand Building Workshops, Product Branding.
name: Robin Bramman
title: Sr Brand Consultant | Founder/CEO Brandtini | Women Who Startup #BasecampPhx City Leader | Board Member CO+HOOTS FDN
